item.title: Terrain
item.description: Weird creep floating islands Giant crystal caves hot springs (yellowstone) high cold jungle plains underground river cenote tar pit.

item.title: Overview of the World
item.description: All people in every land and in every age have heard of the Valles, the stern-walled sea that connects civilization. The wealth of Ophir, the hundred kingdoms of Alchera, many-hued Thaumasia, and the Ophidian empire name the Valles their pulsing vein.

item.title: Tithonia
item.description: Fallen kingdom of failed immortals Mythos of Eos and Tithonus, trapped as a cicada. Dawn, music Creatures rise with the dawn, reborn A place aging but never dying Fight over the only commodity worth anything, youth Scales: death, order Death: -2 Order: +2 Fire: +1 Hex ideas dryad youth bandits the old hag wolf lair mud pit nemean lion (aged) aging pilgrimâ€™s shrine on the border fountain of youth Enclaves ideas buying children from other lands to put in illusory peter pan land .

item.title: Tithonia Key
item.description: Sheltering Cave (24,39) A small cave provides adequate shelter, apparently having been used by previous travelers who have scrawled their marks on the cavern walls.

item.title: Thistlemaw - Dryad Fortress
item.description: Location: 330, 223 Dryad leads small raiding force which steal youth from those in the area, extracting tolls and trying to maintain a fief. Have bonded with parasitic plants instead of normal trees.

item.title: Shrine to Senescence
item.description: Location: 342, 225 Small congregation of two dozen wizened pilgrims, trapped by their own age and unable to leave. Driven here by a fear of death, some are of great import in their native lands.

item.title: Opal's Hut
item.description: Grim Opal is a hag exiled from the Green Gavi and has taken up residents in a low bog. Alongside divinations and other such magics she offers to guide worthy travelers along the northern passage into Noctis, avoiding the perilous clashing rocks.

item.title: Moonlight Grove
item.description: Location: 332, 223 Source of nature essence 2 Ancient wise tree sits secluded between mountains, home to first dryad of the region.

item.title: Cicada Spawning Ground
item.description: Various years are overrun with cicadas. Influence of youth and vitality refreshes the dying land.
